name: ShelteringActivities
0:
”Alexa, open Sheltering Activities.”
”Alexa, ask Sheltering Activities to give me an entertainment suggestion.”
”Alexa, ask Sheltering Activities to suggest a community activity.”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: sheltering activities
des:
Ask Alexa to suggest activities you can do while we shelter in place. Activity categories include: Entertainment, Physical Fitness, Finance, Mental Fitness, Nutrition, Career, Home, and Community. For a complete list of activities, visit shelteringactivities.com.

The information in this skill is provided for informational and educational purposes only.

priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
